授業目的:
The subtitle of this course is - Analyzing Political Speeches.
The purpose of this course is to instruct students how to understand political speeches in English.
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand the use of rhetoric.
Students will be able to understand political metaphor.

第1回: Homework Package - Students will be given a homework pack containing 2 speeches to examine and discuss.
第5回:
Speech 1 - Barack Obama's Inaugural Speech, 20, January, 2009.
Meaning - understanding the speech at the basic level of grammar, vocabulary, pragmatics, and cultural references.
第6回:
Speech 1 - Barack Obama's Inaugural Speech, 20, January, 2009.
Analysis - Rhetoric and metaphor
第7回:
Speech 1 - Barack Obama's Inaugural Speech, 20, January, 2009.
Critical Discourse Analysis
